enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is between 6 months and 9 months-52
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks-92

ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeaslesMCVDose0VS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTMeaslesMCVDose0 ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMeaslesMCVDose0VS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
